sense.def: Alternative Names jie zi 癤子 ; chuang jie 瘡癤 , pimple sores; jie zhong 癤腫 , pimple swelling. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of acute festering developing as a mild condition in a small dermal region. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 32: 腫一寸至二寸，癤也 , “When the swelling extends over one to two inches, these are pimples ”. Jie chang 截腸 , severed intestine [2]

Pathological Condition identical with tuo gang 脫肛 , prolapse of the rectum. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 10: 大腸 頭出寸余，痛苦，直候乾，自退落。又出，名為截腸病 , “When the end of the large intestine protrudes a cun or more, with pain, and when, after its protruding part has dried and fallen off by itself, another section appears, this is called the ‘ severed intestine ’ disease”.
